title: Why's Viktor disabled?
body: Why is Viktor disabled? Gotta get my freelo :/

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Best Viktor AU,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KkbEJQ54,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-15T06:30:22.930+0000)
>
> Why is Viktor disabled? Gotta get my freelo :/

He went full robot. Never go full robot.

Since its Rumble and Viktor, my guess it something to do with their unique spell casting of Viktors E and Rumbles Ult.

There was a bug with Viktor E for a while when if you had it smartcasted it bugged out sometimes.
I never noticed anything wrong with smartcasting his E. Dynamax (in this thread) said it was about their shields. Hopefully it's fixed soon!
I'm pretty sure it's a bug with the shield giving like 1k HP or something, not entirely sure. Shame about your freelo man </3
But I played him last night and he was fine... (he won my last promo game to plat <3)
Likely it came with the patch.
a bug, dunno what it is (including rumble)
